java/liquibase/change/CreateTableChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.*;
00005 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import liquibase.exception.InvalidChangeDefinitionException;
00010 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00013 
00014 import java.util.ArrayList;
00015 import java.util.HashSet;
00016 import java.util.List;
00017 import java.util.Set;
00018 
00022 public class CreateTableChange extends AbstractChange implements ChangeWithColumns {
00023 
00024     private List<ColumnConfig> columns;
00025     private String schemaName;
00026     private String tableName;
00027     private String tablespace;
00028     private String remarks;
00029 
00030     public CreateTableChange() {
00031         super("createTable", "Create Table");
00032         columns = new ArrayList<ColumnConfig>();
00033     }
00034 
00035     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00036         if (getColumns().size() == 0) {
00037             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("No columns defined", this);
00038         }
00039         for (ColumnConfig column : getColumns()) {
00040             if (StringUtils.trimToNull(column.getName()) == null) {
00041                 throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("Column name is required", this);
00042             }
00043             if (StringUtils.trimToNull(column.getType()) == null) {
00044                 throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("Column type is required", this);
00045             }
00046         }
00047     }
00048 
00049     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00050 
00051         String schemaName = getSchemaName() == null ? database.getDefaultSchemaName() : getSchemaName();
00052         CreateTableStatement statement = new CreateTableStatement(schemaName, getTableName());
00053         for (ColumnConfig column : getColumns()) {
00054             ConstraintsConfig constraints = column.getConstraints();
00055             boolean isAutoIncrement = column.isAutoIncrement() != null && column.isAutoIncrement();
00056             if (constraints != null && constraints.isPrimaryKey() != null && constraints.isPrimaryKey()) {
00057 
00058                 statement.addPrimaryKeyColumn(column.getName(), database.getColumnType(column.getType(), isAutoIncrement), constraints.getPrimaryKeyName());
00059 
00060             } else {
00061                 String defaultValue = null;
00062                 if (column.hasDefaultValue()) {
00063                     defaultValue = StringUtils.trimToNull(column.getDefaultColumnValue(database));
00064                 }
00065                 statement.addColumn(column.getName(),
00066                         database.getColumnType(column.getType(), column.isAutoIncrement()),
00067                         defaultValue);
00068             }
00069 
00070 
00071             if (constraints != null) {
00072                 if (constraints.isNullable() != null && !constraints.isNullable()) {
00073                     statement.addColumnConstraint(new NotNullConstraint(column.getName()));
00074                 }
00075 
00076                 if (constraints.getReferences() != null) {
00077                     if (StringUtils.trimToNull(constraints.getForeignKeyName()) == null) {
00078                         throw new UnsupportedChangeException("createTable with references requires foreignKeyName");
00079                     }
00080                     ForeignKeyConstraint fkConstraint = new ForeignKeyConstraint(constraints.getForeignKeyName(), constraints.getReferences());
00081                     fkConstraint.setColumn(column.getName());
00082                     fkConstraint.setDeleteCascade(constraints.isDeleteCascade() != null && constraints.isDeleteCascade());
00083                     fkConstraint.setInitiallyDeferred(constraints.isInitiallyDeferred() != null && constraints.isInitiallyDeferred());
00084                     fkConstraint.setDeferrable(constraints.isDeferrable() != null && constraints.isDeferrable());
00085                     statement.addColumnConstraint(fkConstraint);
00086                 }
00087 
00088                 if (constraints.isUnique() != null && constraints.isUnique()) {
00089                     statement.addColumnConstraint(new UniqueConstraint(constraints.getUniqueConstraintName()).addColumns(column.getName()));
00090                 }
00091             }
00092 
00093             if (isAutoIncrement) {
00094                 statement.addColumnConstraint(new AutoIncrementConstraint(column.getName()));
00095             }
00096         }
00097 
00098         statement.setTablespace(StringUtils.trimToNull(getTablespace()));
00099 
00100         List<SqlStatement> statements = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00101         statements.add(statement);
00102 
00103         return statements.toArray(new SqlStatement[statements.size()]);
00104     }
00105 
00106     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00107         DropTableChange inverse = new DropTableChange();
00108         inverse.setSchemaName(getSchemaName());
00109         inverse.setTableName(getTableName());
00110 
00111         return new Change[]{
00112                 inverse
00113         };
00114     }
00115 
00116     public List<ColumnConfig> getColumns() {
00117         return columns;
00118     }
00119 
00120     public String getSchemaName() {
00121         return schemaName;
00122     }
00123 
00124     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00125         this.schemaName = StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName);
00126     }
00127 
00128     public String getTableName() {
00129         return tableName;
00130     }
00131 
00132     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00133         this.tableName = tableName;
00134     }
00135 
00136 
00137     public String getTablespace() {
00138         return tablespace;
00139     }
00140 
00141     public void setTablespace(String tablespace) {
00142         this.tablespace = tablespace;
00143     }
00144 
00145     public void addColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00146         columns.add(column);
00147     }
00148 
00149     public String getRemarks() {
00150         return remarks;
00151     }
00152 
00153     public void setRemarks(String remarks) {
00154         this.remarks = remarks;
00155     }
00156 
00157     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00158         return "Table " + tableName + " created";
00159     }
00160 
00161     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00162         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("createTable");
00163         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00164             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00165         }
00166 
00167         element.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00168         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(tablespace) != null) {
00169             element.setAttribute("tablespace", tablespace);
00170         }
00171         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(remarks) != null) {
00172             element.setAttribute("remarks", remarks);
00173         }
00174         for (ColumnConfig column : getColumns()) {
00175             element.appendChild(column.createNode(currentChangeLogFileDOM));
00176         }
00177         return element;
00178     }
00179 
00180     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00181         Set<DatabaseObject> returnSet = new HashSet<DatabaseObject>();
00182 
00183         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00184         returnSet.add(table);
00185 
00186         for (ColumnConfig columnConfig : getColumns()) {
00187             Column column = new Column();
00188             column.setTable(table);
00189             column.setName(columnConfig.getName());
00190 
00191             returnSet.add(column);
00192         }
00193 
00194         return returnSet;
00195     }
00196 }
